page.shortlink: api client api a5 u array object to method

argument.name: properties
argument.description: The array of property names to use in the object.

argument.name: values
argument.description: The array of data to be converted.

page.description: Convert an array into an object.

discussion.p: The A5.u.array.object.to method can convert an array of data into an object. Missing values will be output as null.

page.example: var res = A5.u.array.object.to(['a','b','c'],[1,2]); // res = {a: 1, b: 2, c: null}
